Question
========

For comparing two averages, a confidence interval for a difference of two averages μ~1~ - μ~2~ is calculated. The confidence interval contains only negative numbers. This means that

Answerlist
----------

* Μ1 is smaller than μ2
* Μ1 is greater than μ2
* Both μ1 and μ2 cannot have been positive

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Μ1 is smaller than μ2: Correct
* Μ1 is greater than μ2: Incorrect
* Both μ1 and μ2 cannot have been positive: Incorrect
